mission: Pioneering secure, autonomous AI systems by enforcing deterministic auditing layers and local-first data sovereignty.

core_pillars.title: Adversarial Robustness
core_pillars.description: Implementing real-time auditing via the AgenticGuardian to detect and neutralize prompt injection and malformed logic.

core_pillars.title: Asynchronous Multi-Agent Orchestration
core_pillars.description: Coordinating specialized sub-agents through a non-blocking control layer for high-throughput, low-latency artifact generation.

core_pillars.title: Data Sovereignty & Local Inference
core_pillars.description: Exclusively utilizing local inference engines to eliminate third-party data leaks and maximize privacy-first execution.

core_pillars.title: Self-Healing Architecture
core_pillars.description: Utilizing recursive feedback loops to identify structural failures and autonomously apply patches without human intervention.

portfolio_highlights: Autonomous Agentic Debugger with Recursive Repair
Cognitive Trace Logging for AI Auditability
